meanings.sent1: The overabundance of toys in the playroom made it difficult to walk.
meanings.sent2: The garden had an overabundance of flowers, creating a beautiful display.
meanings.sent3: The overabundance of cake at the party led to everyone feeling too full.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter was like an overabundance of joy spilling out of her.
meanings.sent5: The overabundance of stars in the night sky took my breath away.

meanings.sent1: The grocery store had an overabundance of apples on sale.
meanings.sent2: After the holiday season, there was an overabundance of decorations in the store.
meanings.sent3: The overabundance of ice cream flavors made it hard to choose just one.
meanings.sent4: His kindness was like an overabundance of warmth on a cold day.
meanings.sent5: The overabundance of books on the shelves delighted the avid reader.
